title: Supplier default risk due to financial instability
Quality issues with procured goods or services
Delays in delivery causing project timeline slippage
Cost escalation due to fluctuating market prices
Non-compliance with regulatory or environmental standards
Dependency on a single source of supply
Fraud or unethical practices in the supply chain
Intellectual property risks in procurement contracts
Data security risks from third-party vendors
Operational inefficiencies due to complex procurement processes
Risks of supply chain disruption due to geopolitical tensions
Currency exchange rate fluctuations impacting procurement costs
Inadequate supplier due diligence leading to reputational damage
Technological obsolescence of procured equipment or systems
Environmental sustainability risks in the supply chain
